item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (139 points | 35 comments)
2. OpenBSD now enforcing no invalid NUL characters in shell scripts (39 points | 23 comments)
3. Move Fast and Abandon Things (50 points | 6 comments)
4. Jetstream: Shrinking the AT Protocol Firehose by >99% (50 points | 17 comments)
5. Fully documented source code for Lander on the Acorn Archimedes (89 points | 17 comments)
6. Show HN: JSON For You – Visualize JSON in graph or table views (21 points | 9 comments)
7. The Quest to Build a Telescope on the Moon (36 points | 10 comments)
8. Evan Prodromou Launches the Social Web Foundation (6 points | 1 comment)
9. Halide rejected from App Store because it doesn't explain why it takes photos (79 points | 54 comments)
10. Coding Font by Typogram – Find Your True Love of Coding Fonts (27 points | 15 comments)
11. Maker Pipe – Structural Pipe Fittings for DIY Builders (125 points | 51 comments)
12. Show HN: Oodle – serverless, fully-managed, drop-in replacement for Prometheus (22 points | 7 comments)
13. Finish Your Projects (5 points | discuss)
14. In 1870, Lord Rayleigh used oil and water to calculate the size of molecules (435 points | 142 comments)
15. Giving T cells extra batteries supercharges them against cancer (28 points | 8 comments)
16. Radioactive Tape Dispenser (1970s) (46 points | 19 comments)
17. Show HN: An expression parser supporting multiple types (11 points | 3 comments)
18. Show HN: I Wrote a Book on Java (486 points | 125 comments)
19. Tracy: A real time, nanosecond resolution frame profiler (101 points | 18 comments)
20. I designed a Dieter Rams-inspired iPhone dock (1359 points | 310 comments)
21. EzAudio: Enhancing Text-to-Audio Generation with Efficient Diffusion Transformer (56 points | 5 comments)
22. We fine-tuned Llama 405B on AMD GPUs (385 points | 77 comments)
23. What, Me Worry? The Art and Humor of Mad Magazine (202 points | 92 comments)
24. Free-form floor plan design using differentiable Voronoi diagram (217 points | 47 comments)
25. One Collatz Coincidence (41 points | 18 comments)
26. Inside a Ferroelectric RAM Chip (119 points | 54 comments)
27. Launch HN: Panora (YC S24) – Data Integration API for LLMs (76 points | 11 comments)
28. Several people detained in Switzerland over death in a 'suicide capsule' (5 points | discuss)
29. What I've Learned in the Past Year Spent Building an AI Video Editor (85 points | 39 comments)
30. Dumped orange peel transformed a barren pasture (2017) (150 points | 76 comments)
